L

lblCurrentTable - Variable in class application.StaffScreenController
 
lblDatabaseStatus - Variable in class application.LoginController
 
lblLoginStatus - Variable in class application.LoginController
 
lblUser - Variable in class application.ManagerScreenController
 
lblUser - Variable in class application.StaffScreenController
 
login(ActionEvent) - Method in class application.LoginController
This method is called upon a user pressing the login button it validates whether the credentials they entered are valid by calling the verify methods from the LoginModel object and then opens the manager screen or the staff screen if the login inputs permits that.
LoginController - Class in application
This class provides the logic (other than direct database interactions) to the LoginScreen GUI
LoginController() - Constructor for class application.LoginController
 
loginModel - Variable in class application.LoginController
 
LoginModel - Class in application
The LoginModel class contains all the methods that the LoginScreenController class uses to access and interact with the database, this class focuses on verifying the login details a potential user may enter, it also initialises the necessary tables that this application will need to function at the bare minimum if the local RestaurantDB.sqlite file is deleted and a new one is created with no tables by default.
LoginModel() - Constructor for class application.LoginModel
The LoginModel class constructor initialises a connection to the SQLite database and initialises tables if they are not found The methods and structure in this class and its children are derived from the tutorials available from the ProgrammingKnowledge playlist JavaFX tutorial for beginners : https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9YrmON6nlEw&list=PLS1QulWo1RIaUGP446_pWLgTZPiFizEMq
